abstract: Royal Dutch Shell says it has agreed to sell its stake in the Statfjord oil field in the Norwegian North Sea and several related assets to Centrica Resources for $225 million, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Royal Dutch Shell says it has agreed to sell its stake in the Statfjord oil field in the Norwegian North Sea and several related assets to Centrica Resources for $225 million, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Royal Dutch Shell says it has agreed to sell its stake in the Statfjord oil field in the Norwegian North Sea and several related assets to Centrica Resources for $225 million, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Shell Sells Norwegian Field for $225 Million
